title: Newspoint Galaxy Note 8 Privacy Screen Protector, Anti-Spy Case Friendly Support in-Screen Unlock Flexible TPU Film, Anti-Scratch Full Adhesive Coverage Soft Film for Samsung Galaxy Note 8, Black
features: PRIVACY PROTECTION - 2-Way left and right protect your confidential information from other people at your side and they will only see a darkened screen. No more leaking confidential information in public.

CASE FRIENDLY - The soft film screen protector designed with extra space left on around the borders, specially for users who need to use mobile phone case, compatible with more Galaxy Note 8 phone cases. (NOT including thick or hard phone case)

ORIGINAL TOUCH SENSITIVITY - Applied the Nano glue technology and full adhesive coverage feature allow it an excellent touch sensitivity and promises full compatibility with your phone touchscreen sensitivity.
ANTI-SCRATCH - 0.18mm thickness with Self-healing properties enable the flexible film to recover from minor scratches over time to keep your gadgets looking great.

LIFETIME WARRANTY - Galaxy Note 8 Privacy Screen Protectors are quality inspection before shipping. If you have any issue with our product, let us know at any time, we will help you to solve it within 24 hours!
description: Q: There are always some curious eyes that snoop on your phone screen. Are you worried about  someone intruding in your privacy? A: Newspoint offers an anti peeping nano shield screen protector. Worry-free about privacy leaks.

Newspoint full adhesive soft film with Self-healing properties enable the film to recover from minor scratches over time to keep your gadgets looking great. In addition; It's designed with less coverage on the edge of the film so that it does not interfere with the coverage from cases. This product is compatible with most cases.

Once installed the 3D curve edge nano screen protector by a right way, there is no effect on touch responsiveness  and no more dead spots or lag when you tap your screen. It's not too thick, not too thin, not flimsy or interfere with the touch screen.
Our screen protector designed with 3D curve edge, they have the ability to conform to curves and works with most thin or soft cases . (Not including thick or hard phone case)
At Newspoint; No matter what quality problem you encounter, we'll offer you

if: you encounter installation problems such as irremovable bubbles or the product does not match your screen size. (not including damage caused by installation) you receive a defective/ damaged product.
